task.title: How to Dance With a Baby
task.shortdesc: How to break it down with a stupid dumb baby!

ul.li: A small stupid dumb tiny baby.
Music (not Kanye, or anything else cringe)

context.p: I will be teaching you how to dance with a small tiny dumb baby. It can be quite a difficult task to accomplish that, I daresay. Use this task when you find yourself wanting to dance with a baby, ideally only after the small stupid baby has had a nap.

info.note: Be sure the stupid baby has a clean diaper.
